sense.def:
Izraz
which
uporabljamo za postavljanje vprašanj, kadar imamo dva ali več odgovorov ali možnosti.

Izraz
which
se nanaša na izbiro med dvema ali več odgovori ali možnostmi.

seg.quote: I don't know which country he played for.
The book says one thing and you say another. I don't know which to believe.

sense.def:
Izraz
which
uporabimo tudi na začetku odvisnega stavka, ki opredeli stvar, o kateri govorimo, ali pove več podatkov o njej.

seg.quote: ...the awful conditions which exist in British prisons.
We sat on the carpet, which was pale green.

sense.def:
Izraz
which
se lahko nanaša tudi na pravkar povedano.

seg.quote: It takes me an hour from door to door, which is not bad.
I enjoy these dinners, unless I have to make a speech, in which case I worry throughout the meal.
